project.name: Somatic-Canticles-Webapp
assumptions: Birth date + timezone sufficient for biorhythm calculation
Sunrise/sunset data available via external API
Audio files pre-recorded or placeholder used initially
Cloudflare free tier sufficient for beta (13 users)
risks: warcraftcn-ui integration complexity (MEDIUM) - Mitigation: Start with core components, adapt gradually
Biorhythm calculation accuracy (HIGH) - Mitigation: Validate against 3+ calculators
Audio recording delays (MEDIUM) - Mitigation: Use placeholder audio, record in parallel
Unlock logic complexity (MEDIUM) - Mitigation: Start simple, iterate
User engagement (HIGH) - Mitigation: Beta test early (Day 50-52)
NextAuth + JWT integration (MEDIUM) - Mitigation: Follow ADR-004, test early
